meanings.definition: A protein subunit that makes up the capsid of a virus.
meanings.sent1: The capsomer helps form the protective shell of the virus.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study how the capsomer interacts with other viral components.
meanings.sent3: When the capsomer went to a party, it was the life of the virus!
meanings.sent4: The capsomer stood strong like a tiny building block in the virus's structure.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the capsomer looked like a tiny puzzle piece fitting perfectly.

meanings.definition: A structural unit of a virus composed of multiple capsomers.
meanings.sent1: The capsomer units come together to create the virus's structure.
meanings.sent2: Each capsomer contributes to the overall stability of the virus.
meanings.sent3: The capsomers held a meeting to discuss their roles in the virus.
meanings.sent4: The virus was like a city built from countless capsomers as building blocks.
meanings.sent5: The capsomers linked arms, forming a strong chain in the virus's design.
